Our offer will be start from Ashadh 2080. Hope you all take this offer .
Hope this app will able to provide the good services to you.

Yatra app whose aim is to provide a convenient and efficient solution for both bike rental businesses and customers. Either you are on vacation or want to take a ride around the city, bikes are promising vehicles to give you absolute freedom and fun to move around the way you want. You can simply rent a bike rather than owning it and be free from maintaining it. This app will bring simplicity and increase accessibility to the bike renting business
